thread.title: Regina Cassandra to play female lead opposite Vishnu Vishal in the film directed by Chella Ayyavu - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Regina Cassandra to play female lead opposite Vishnu Vishal in the film directed by Chella Ayyavu - Tamil Movie News

title: Regina Cassandra to play female lead opposite Vishnu Vishal in the film directed by Chella Ayyavu - Tamil Movie News
text: A few months back it was announced that Vishnu Vishal will be acting in a film to be directed by Chella Ayyavu who worked as a cod-director of Ezhil in last year's super hit comedy flick 'Velainu Vandhuttua Vellaikaaran'. This film will be produced by Vishnu Vishal's V Studios banner which produced 'VVV'. Now the yet to be titled film of Vishnu Vishal and Chella Ayyavu has got a heroine. It has been confirmed that Regina Cassandra whose next release will be director Selvaraghavan's 'Nenjam Marappathillai', will be playing the female lead in this film. This will be the first time the two young and talented actors will be seen sharing space and it is going to be a refreshing experience for movie buffs. Vishnu Vishal is presently shooting for his second production venture 'Kathanayagan' directed by debutant Muruganandam.
